title: Session Timestamp
description: A timestamp for the beginning and end of an app session

appId.description: Unique Connect identifier of the app originating the event

userId.description: Unique Connect identifier of the user originating the event

sessionId.description: Unique Connect identifier of the session originating the event

sessionBegin.description: Timestamp for the beginning of the session

sessionEnd.description: Timestamp for the end of the session
